items.sentence: The only thing Tom knows how to cook is spaghetti.
Is there anybody here who isn't afraid to do that?
I don't need to go to work the day after tomorrow.
One of Tom's bad habits is biting his fingernails.
Tom did his best to persuade Mary to come with us.
I tried to change the topic as quickly as I could.
I've heard that most mammals can swim by instinct.
Does anyone here actually know what they're doing?
Will you be at Tom's party the day after tomorrow?
Tom's daughter is married and has three daughters.
